title: Gallery Talk: Vaginal Davis—The White to Be Angry
title_display: Gallery Talk: Vaginal Davis—The White to be Angry
hero_caption: Vaginal Davis as G.B. Jones in Beggars of Life segment from The White to be Angry. Photo by John AES Nihil of Aesthetic Nihilism Pictorial.
short_description: Join postdoctoral curatorial fellow Solveig Nelson and educator Nenette Luarca-Shoaf to view and discuss Vaginal Davis's seminal video The White to be Angry. We’ll consider the artwork’s impact and meaning in the 1980s and its continuing relevance today.
description:
Join postdoctoral curatorial fellow Solveig Nelson and educator Nenette Luarca-Shoaf to view and discuss Vaginal Davis's provocative video The White to be Angry. We’ll consider the artwork’s impact and meaning in the 1980s and its continuing relevance today.

Please note: This tour has limited capacity. Participation will be on a first-come, first-served basis.

Persons with disabilities who would like to request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program are encouraged to send an email to access@artic.edu two weeks in advance of the program.
